attributes.action: The UK should cut off all utilities to Russian embassies/consulates in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The illegal Russian attack on Ukraine as cost the lives of countless citizens on both sides. The civilians of Ukraine are at present suffering untold hardships be of Russia targeting of civilian infrastructure. All Russian politicians are complicit in the actions of the Russian state. Cutting off the utilities for Russian buildings within the UK is just another tool to force Russia to leave Ukrainian territory.
attributes.background: The elected representatives of the people of the United Kingdom should be given the opportunity to debate this question within parliament. Russia should be given taste of their own medicine.

rejection.details:
The Government isn't responsible for providing utilities to embassies, nor is it able to direct their disconnection.

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625559
